sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update reference qualifier for consumer field on Contract when household plugin is installed</description>
        <name>Set consumer ref_qual of contract</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var sysDictionaryGr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	sysDictionaryGr.addQuery("name", "ast_contract");
	sysDictionaryGr.addQuery("element", "consumer");
	sysDictionaryGr.query();
	if (!sysDictionaryGr.next()) {
		return;
	}
	sysDictionaryGr.setValue("reference_qual", "javascript:new sn_csm_household.HouseHoldUtils().getConsumersAvailableForHousehold(current.household)");
	sysDictionaryGr.update();
}
)();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-12 22:00:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4478fd0d53230010b37cddeeff7b1260</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set consumer ref_qual of contract</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4478fd0d53230010b37cddeeff7b1260</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-03-12 22:00:08</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
